text: Hindu temple with a view and itâ€™s only temple in Singapore on mountain previously. Location is hill view. Revamped with a very nice colours and facilities like lift.
Beautifully renovated and have facilties to do abhishek for shiva linga too. Mathuraveeran have also joined the clan with karuppar and muneeswaran. Love the new look!

Today was a truly special day! Kitty and I made our way to Sri Murugan Hill Temple to celebrate Ganesha's birthday.  It was such a beautiful and peaceful temple, with a unique structure unlike anything I've seen before.  We were drawn to the vibrant colors and intricate carvings, and the atmosphere was filled with a sense of devotion and tranquility.

We were so happy to be able to offer our prayers and blessings to Ganesha.  It felt incredibly powerful to be surrounded by so many other devotees who were also celebrating his birthday.  Kitty and I both felt a sense of peace and connection as we offered our prayers and offerings.

The temple is a testament to the power of faith and perseverance, and it's clear that the community here is deeply dedicated to their beliefs.  We were so grateful to be able to experience this special place and celebrate Ganesha's birthday with so many others.

Today was a special day - Ganesha's birthday! Donkey and I made our way to Sri Murugan Hill Temple to celebrate with a sense of wonder and excitement. It was my first time stepping inside this temple, and it was truly an unforgettable experience.

The temple's architecture was unlike anything I'd seen before - a stunning blend of vibrant colors and intricate carvings. The atmosphere was peaceful and filled with a sense of devotion, making me feel instantly at ease.

We joined the other devotees in offering prayers and blessings to Ganesha, a truly powerful experience.  Being surrounded by so many people sharing in the celebration created a sense of unity and connection. Donkey and I felt a profound sense of peace as we offered our own prayers and offerings.

It was clear that the community here is deeply dedicated to their beliefs. Sri Murugan Hill Temple is a testament to the power of faith and perseverance.  We were incredibly grateful to have had the opportunity to experience this special place and celebrate Ganesha's birthday with so many others.

This beautiful temple of Lord Muruga is not really situated on a hill, but is at an elevated level which can very easily be accessed by climbing some steps. This temple is just a 2 minutes walk from Bukit Panjang MRT station.

This temple has beautiful, colourful statues of all Gods and Goddesses. Apart from Lord Muruga, shrines of Lord Shiva and Parvathi along with several other Gods like Ayyapan, Durga are all present, including that of Lord Buddha
